channel.title: Adding customs and the image?
channel.description:
Hey, I'm wondering how to change the custom items image? Because on my client I've got a Dragon Crossbow and the image is like a ourg bone and when i wield it, it is glitched because it shows like a broken Karils Xbow under my feet? Also, I have this problem with quite a few other customs. If you need or want me to list them, feel free to ask.
Thanks alot.

item.title: Adding customs and the image?
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

get the right ints and models for it and put it in class8

Read full topic
